title: Apartment For Sale - Royal Park
details:
Luxury apartment fully furnished, fully air conditioned.
02 bed rooms, 02 bath rooms, maid room + maid bath room.

Common Facilities -
Swimming pool, Gym, Sauna
Sqush, Tennis court, Table tennis, Pool table
Super market, Restaurant, Saloon, Laundry
24 hrs. security, Elevators, parking slot, Back up genarators

NO AGENTS PLEASE
